GK19padnscpu:692: vinidrasatkesarapaṅkajā babhau vane nivātastimiteva padminī // PNc_4.27 //
GK19padnscpu:696: mukhaṃ sudhādīdhitisundaraṃ dadhan vane gataḥ ko 'yam anaṅgavibhramaḥ // PNc_4.28 //
GK19padnscpu:698: asatyam etāsu rucā vitanvatī latāsu kārtasvarapallavodgamam // PNc_4.29 //
GK19padnscpu:700: vadaty ayaṃ madhyamalokapālatāṃ parārdhyacūḍāmaṇinā ca maulinā // PNc_4.30 //
GK19padnscpu:701: anātapatro 'yam atra lakṣyate sitātapatrair iva sarvato vṛtaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:702: acāmaro 'py eṣa sateva vījyate vilāsavālavyajanena ko 'pi ayam // PNc_4.31 //
GK19padnscpu:703: priyā iyam ārūḍhaguṇā suvaṃśabhūr na cāntikaṃ cāpalatāsya muñcati /
GK19padnscpu:704: ime pṛṣatkā api pārthivaśriyo vilāsakarṇotpalapallavā iva // PNc_4.32 //
GK19padnscpu:706: adhas taruṇām amunā vinīyate kṣaṇaṃ mṛgavyopanataḥ pariśramaḥ // PNc_4.33 //
GK19padnscpu:707: ayaṃ sa na syān navasāhasāṅka ity anaṅgalīlāsu kṛtī bhuvaḥpatiḥ /
GK19padnscpu:708: sa yena mukto nijanāmalāñchitaḥ śaśiprabhākelikuraṅgake śaraḥ // PNc_4.34 //
GK19padnscpu:709: ayaṃ sa no hāra ivāsya dṛśyate karodare pallavapāṭalatviṣi /
GK19padnscpu:710: itaḥ kim etasya na saikate saḥ kiṃ sitacchado locanagocaraṃ gataḥ // PNc_4.35 //
GK19padnscpu:711: suvarṇapuṅkhe likhitaṃ śilīmukhe tad asya nāmāsti samānam ākṛteḥ /
GK19padnscpu:712: yad adbhutām ekapade pṛṣatkatām agād anaṅgasya śaśiprābhāṃ prati // PNc_4.36 //
GK19padnscpu:713: anena ced yogam upaiti daivataḥ phanīndrakanyā śaśineva rohiṇī /
GK19padnscpu:714: analpalāvaṇyatiraskṛtopamaṃ vapus tad asyāḥ saphalatvam eṣyati // PNc_4.37 //
GK19padnscpu:715: vidhātum enām aham eva vā kṣamā mitodarīm aṅkatale 'sya ko vidhiḥ /
GK19padnscpu:716: mamedṛśe yadviṣaye vimatsarāḥ stuvanti sakhyo masṛṇoktisauṣṭhavam // PNc_4.38 //
GK19padnscpu:718: kutūhalākṣiptanimeṣalāsyayā vilokayan mām iva dīrghayā dṛśā // PNc_4.39 //
GK19padnscpu:721: athādhigantuṃ kila tasya patriṇo gatiṃ vanānte katham apy alakṣitām /
GK19padnscpu:722: tam abhyagāt sā nṛpatiṃ sacāmarā sarit saphenā nidhim ambhasām iva // PNc_4.40 //
GK19padnscpu:723: samuccaran nūpurasinncitaiḥ padair yathā yathā saṃmukham ājagāma sā /
GK19padnscpu:724: tayāyatākṣyeva tathātatheritā dṛg asya paścād apasāram ādade // PNc_4.41 //
GK19padnscpu:725: śanais tatas tāṃ savidhopasarpaṇīṃ nirīkṣya hāraṃ pidadhe narādhipaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:726: nijottarīyeṇa sitena mārutaḥ śaraddhaneneva śaśāṅkamaṇḍalam // PNc_4.42 //
GK19padnscpu:728: iti prarohadbahumānamantharo babhūva tasminn avanīpurandaraḥ // PNc_4.43 //
GK19padnscpu:730: tamiddhamuktābharaṇaṃ bhuvaḥpatiṃ payodhiveleva suvelam āpa sā // PNc_4.44 //
GK19padnscpu:731: avāpa devaḥ śriyam antikasthayā tayā sa vālavyajanāṅkahastayā /
GK19padnscpu:736: athānubhavena nideśiteva sā nanāma māninyavaśā viśāṃpatim // PNc_4.46 //
GK19padnscpu:737: dṛśā narendreṇa nideśite svayaṃ śilātale nātividūravartini /
GK19padnscpu:742: iti kṣitīśeṅgitavartmadīpikām udīrayām āsa giraṃ ramāṅgadaḥ // PNc_4.48 //
GK19padnscpu:743: anena vindhyādrivihārajanmanā śrameṇa kāmaṃ bhavatī kadarthitā /
GK19padnscpu:746: samunmiṣanti śramavāribindavo natāṅgi lāvaṇyasudhālavās iva // PNc_4.50 //
GK19padnscpu:748: na ghūrṇate khinnalalāṭasaṅginī tavālakaśreṇir iyaṃ manāg api // PNc_4.51 //
GK19padnscpu:750: atha pravālād api pāṭalacchavir na dūyate niḥśvasitena te 'dharaḥ // PNc_4.52 //
GK19padnscpu:752: tavaiṣa kaṇṭhaḥ kuṭajāvadātayā vilāsamuktālatatayeva bhūṣyate // PNc_4.53 //
GK19padnscpu:753: idaṃ mahac citram amānuṣaṃ tvayā vigāhyate yad vanam advitīyayā /
GK19padnscpu:754: imāḥ kva vindhyasya bhuvo 'tidurgamāḥ kva rājaveśmābharaṇaṃ bhavādṛśī // PNc_4.54 //
GK19padnscpu:756: bibharṣi kasyedam anena pāṇinā vadāvadhūtendumarīci cāmaram // PNc_4.55 //
GK19padnscpu:757: nṛpasya kasyāpi paricchadāṅganā yadi tvam uccair vibhavo hi ko 'pi sa /
GK19padnscpu:758: marutpatir menakayeva tanvi yas tvayāpi vālavyajanena vījyate // PNc_4.56 //
GK19padnscpu:759: atha rdhimatyā paravaty asi striyā kayāpi kāsau jagadekasundarī /
GK19padnscpu:760: natabhru yasyāḥ smaracāpayaṣṭayo vidheyatāṃ yānti bhavadvidhā api // PNc_4.57 //
GK19padnscpu:762: marutvato vā ramaṇī ramātha vā kalatram ardhenduvibhūṣaṇasya vā ? // PNc_4.58 //
GK19padnscpu:763: iyaṃ paribhrāntir agendrakandare sakhīva te śaṃsati kāryagauravam /
GK19padnscpu:764: bhavādṛśaḥ śvāpadadūṣite 'nyathā caranty araṇye kim adhīnanītayaḥ // PNc_4.59 //
GK19padnscpu:765: anena khelanmadadantinā vada tvam āgatā caṇḍi kuto duradhvanā /
GK19padnscpu:766: vidhāya viśleṣaviṣādam āvayoḥ svakāryaniṣṭhe kathaya kva yāsyasi ? // PNc_4.60 //
GK19padnscpu:770: sahasā na jagāda lajjayā nu śramataḥ kiṃ tu nṛpas tu tām avocat // PNc_4.61 //
GK19padnscpu:771: śrāntāsi kautukahṛtena kadarthitāsi praśnair anena vihito na tavopacāraḥ /
GK19padnscpu:772: ātithyam eṣa kurute param aṅgalekhā- saṃvāhanaikacaturo niculānilas te // PNc_4.62 //
GK19padnscpu:773: evaṃ nisargamadhureṇa sudhārasaika- niṣyandinā phaṇivadhūr atha sā hasantī /
GK19padnscpu:774: candrāṃśunā kumudinīva dinoṣmataptā vītaklamā narapater vacasā babhūva // PNc_4.63 //
GK19padnscpu:775: iti śrīmṛgāṅkaguptasūnoḥ parimalāparanāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye pāṭalādarśanaṃ nāma caturthaḥ sargaḥ
GK19padnscpu:778: atha sā vadane navendukānti- smitam aṅke viniveśya cāmaraṃ ca /
GK19padnscpu:779: jagatīpatim evam ā babhāṣe masṛṇaṃ mūrtimatī vidagdhateva // PNc_5.1 //
GK19padnscpu:781: tvayi puṇyavaśena dṛṣtim āpte labhate śarma gataśramo mamātmā /
GK19padnscpu:782: udite hi virocane nalinyā vitamastāmarasaṃ vikāsam eti // PNc_5.2 //
GK19padnscpu:783: atimātram upoḍhasaukumārye vacasi śrotram upeyuṣi tvadīye /
GK19padnscpu:784: jhaṭiti pratibhāsate mamāyaṃ kaṭhinaś candanapallavāvataṃsaḥ // PNc_5.3 //
GK19padnscpu:785: kim ayaṃ mayi saṃbhramo 'yam āstāṃ kim ayaṃ na eva janaḥ paricchadas te /
GK19padnscpu:786: upacāraviśeṣasaṃvidhāne pratipaccandra iva uditas tvam eva // PNc_5.4 //
GK19padnscpu:787: bhavadiṅgitavedinaiva pṛṣṭā yad anenāham upāntavartinā te /
GK19padnscpu:788: kim u tat kathayāmi sammataṃ cet kriyatāṃ me svayam ājñayā prasādaḥ // PNc_5.5 //
GK19padnscpu:791: abhidhehi lavaḥ kutūhalasya tvadudantaśravaṇe mamāpi jātaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:792: iti sā vasudhāpater nideśād atha pātālavilāsinī jagāda // PNc_5.6 //
GK19padnscpu:795: sa tava śrutim āpta eva tāvat smaralīlābhavanaṃ bhujaṅgalokaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:796: upayāti yad ekadeśasāmyaṃ na mahī nāpi purī purandarasya // PNc_5.7 //
GK19padnscpu:798: phaṇino 'ruṇakāntibhiḥ śirasthair maṇibhir bālam ivātapaṃ vahanti // PNc_5.8 //
GK19padnscpu:799: anulimpati rodasī yathenduḥ prabhayā māṃ na tathety asūyayeva /
GK19padnscpu:800: paṭu yaḥ pramādāvilāsahāsa- stabakair induparamparāḥ prasūte // PNc_5.9 //
GK19padnscpu:802: parito nicitāḥ sadaiva yasmin kakubhas tārikā ivāvabhānti // PNc_5.10 //
GK19padnscpu:803: pratibhāti dadhan phaṇākalāpe pṛthivīṃ yatra saḥ śeṣanāgarājaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:804: nabhaso nipatañ javena bhittvā jagatīṃ gāṅga iva cyutaḥ pravāhaḥ // PNc_5.11 //
GK19padnscpu:807: viditā khalu vāsukes trilokyāṃ harakaṇṭhābharaṇasya bhogibhartuḥ /
GK19padnscpu:808: lalitādbhutabhūmir asti tasmin nagarī bhogavatīti rājadhānī // PNc_5.12 //
GK19padnscpu:810: ṛtavo 'py akhilāḥ sametya yatra smarasāmrājyamahādhuraṃ vahanti // PNc_5.13 //
GK19padnscpu:811: anupādhir upāhṛto vikāsaḥ kamalair yatra vilāsadīrghikāsu /
GK19padnscpu:812: api yatra kumudvatībhir astaḥ sahajaś candramarīcipakṣapātaḥ // PNc_5.14 //
GK19padnscpu:813: abhikān abhisartum udyataḥ san sapadi vyālavilāsinīsamūhaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:814: bhavati svaphaṇāmaṇipradīpe timirotsāriṇi yatra sābhyasūyaḥ // PNc_5.15 //
GK19padnscpu:816: saritaḥ śriyam īrṣyayeva tasyāḥ suvate mauktikam eva yat payāṃsi // PNc_5.16 //
GK19padnscpu:818: vidadhāti sadaiva yatra yūnāṃ padam aṅke vanitā ca vallakī ca // PNc_5.17 //
GK19padnscpu:819: śataśo vilasanty udaṃśuratna- stabakāḥ kalpalatā yad aṅgaṇeṣu /
GK19padnscpu:820: pratimandriram evam eva yasyām api cintāmaṇayaḥ pade luṭhanti // PNc_5.18 //
GK19padnscpu:821: api dattakutūhalāḥ surāṇām api vāñcchāpadam ekapiṅgalasya /
GK19padnscpu:822: api nirviṣayā manorathānām uragān yatra vibhūtayaḥ śrayante // PNc_5.19 //
GK19padnscpu:823: vasati svayam eva yatra devaḥ sadā kalpitahāṭakeśvarākhyaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:824: smaram ūrdhvavilocanārciṣīva tripuraṃ yaḥ śarapāvake juhāva // PNc_5.20 //
GK19padnscpu:830: nijavaṃśaviśeṣako 'sti tasyām uragāṇām adhipaḥ saḥ śaṅkhapālaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:831: srag asāv iti yat phaṇāsu dhatte vasudhāṃ vāsukinā samānasāraḥ // PNc_5.21 //
GK19padnscpu:834: jagadekalalāma tasya kanyā guṇavaty asti śaśiprabhā nāmnā /
GK19padnscpu:835: sahasaiva phaṇabhṛtāṃ praviṣṭā bhuvane rāhubhayād ivendulekhā // PNc_5.22 //
GK19padnscpu:836: na kayāpy atiśayyate 'tiśīghraṃ yad iyaṃ kandukakeliṣu bhramantī /
GK19padnscpu:837: aparaṃ kṛtam arthavat tad asyāḥ sutarāṃ nāma sakhībhir āśugeti // PNc_5.23 //
GK19padnscpu:838: sphuradadbhutarūpasampadāṃ tām anukartuṃ kalayāpi dhārṣṭyam eti /
GK19padnscpu:839: na ratir na śacī na citralekhā na ghṛtācī na tilottamā na rambhā // PNc_5.24 //
GK19padnscpu:841: nikhilāsu gatā paraṃ prakarṣaṃ śitadhīḥ śaiśavas eva yā kalāsu // PNc_5.25 //
GK19padnscpu:843: viharaty apacīyamānabālyā haraśaile malaye himālaye ca // PNc_5.26 //
GK19padnscpu:845: kvacid apy agamat palāyya tasyāś capalaḥ kelimṛgo mṛgāyatākṣyāḥ // PNc_5.27 //
GK19padnscpu:846: ativatsalayā samaṃ sakhībhir vipine taṃ paritas tayā vicitya /
GK19padnscpu:847: puline saritaḥ śaśāṅkasūteḥ śramavatyeyam anīyata triyāmā // PNc_5.28 //
GK19padnscpu:849: nikaṣā niculapravālaśayyāṃ tam atha prekṣitavaty āptanidram // PNc_5.29 //
GK19padnscpu:850: tapanīyaśilīmukhas tadaṅge cakitaṃ citrarucau tayā ca dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:851: jalade lalitendracāpabhaktau ahimāṃśor iva bhāsuro mayūkhaḥ // PNc_5.30 //
GK19padnscpu:852: aravindadalatviṣā kareṇa svayam utpāṭya sakautukaṃ gṛhīte /
GK19padnscpu:853: avalokitam etayātha tasmin vijayāṅke navasāhasāṅkanāma // PNc_5.31 //
GK19padnscpu:854: aviśan naranātha nāma pūrvaṃ hṛdaye 'syāḥ sahasātha puṣpaketuḥ /
GK19padnscpu:855: amṛtāṃśumarīciluptanidre labhate yat kumude 'ntaraṃ dvirephaḥ // PNc_5.32 //
GK19padnscpu:857: paritaḥ śramavāribindavo ye nirapīyanta payodhaśuktiyūthaiḥ // PNc_5.33 //
GK19padnscpu:858: prakṛtiḥ kila yasya te parītā pariṇāmena tadantare 'tra haṃsaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:859: śayanāntagataṃ mṛṇālaśaṅki shṛtavān hāram adhīralocanāyāḥ // PNc_5.34 //
GK19padnscpu:861: udaḍīyata khe mukhena bibhrad bhujagendrapratimaṃ tam añjasā sa /
GK19padnscpu:863: sa ca vindhyavanāntarājim etām aviśan mārutapītapadmagandhām /
GK19padnscpu:866: atha haṃsam itas tato vicetuṃ vijane nāgavadhūjanaḥ pravṛttaḥ // PNc_5.37 //
GK19padnscpu:868: gahanāsv api tadgaveṣaṇāyai vanalekhāsu mama tvayaṃ prayatnaḥ // PNc_5.38 //
GK19padnscpu:869: sa mayā na taṭeṣu nirjharāṇāṃ sarasāṃ nāpsu na puṇḍarīkaṣaṇḍe /
GK19padnscpu:870: sarasīṣv api nāyatormilekhā ntarapāriplavasārasāsu dṛṣṭaḥ // PNc_5.39 //
GK19padnscpu:872: avadhāraya pāṭaleti nāmnā tanayāṃ mām uragasya hemanāmnaḥ // PNc_5.40 //
GK19padnscpu:873: acale vicayaḥ patatriṇo 'yaṃ phalitaḥ sādhu mamāhitaśramo 'pi /
GK19padnscpu:874: yad itaḥ puruṣottamo 'si dṛṣṭo vanamadhye nibiḍaśriyopagūḍhaḥ // PNc_5.41 //
GK19padnscpu:875: uparodham imaṃ na manyase ced yadi vāsmāsu tavāsti pakṣapātaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:876: vada tac caratā kvacid vane 'smin saḥ sahāro vihagas tvayā nu dṛṣṭaḥ // PNc_5.42 //
GK19padnscpu:877: na sa dṛṣṭim itas tavāpi manye tad ahaṃ tadvicayād ito nivarte /
GK19padnscpu:878: nanu tāmyati kāmam āttacintā cirayantyāṃ mayi sāhirājakanyā // PNc_5.43 //
GK19padnscpu:879: atha vā mṛgabhaṅginopanīte vidhinā sā navasāhasāṅkabāṇe /
GK19padnscpu:880: praṇayārpitalocanā sanāmany adhunāpy ālikhiteva nūnam āste // PNc_5.44 //
GK19padnscpu:883: iti sā samudīrya tatpṛṣatkān avalokyaiva punaś camatkṛtā iva /
GK19padnscpu:885: so nṛlokaśaśī tvam eva manye mṛgayābaddharuciḥ sa yatpṛṣatkaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:886: bhuvanābhayadāyinām amīṣāṃ bhavataḥ saṃvadatīva sāyakānām // PNc_5.46 //
GK19padnscpu:887: sthitam etad ayomukheṣv amīṣu sphutavarṇaṃ tava nāmadheyalakṣma /
GK19padnscpu:888: avanītilaka tvayi prarūḍhaṃ mama sandehalavaṃ balāt pramārṣṭi // PNc_5.47 //
GK19padnscpu:889: samupaiti sanāthatāṃ kim anyat tritayena tritayaṃ narendracandra /
GK19padnscpu:890: tridivaṃ namucidviṣā tvayeyaṃ vasudhā vāsukinā rasātalaṃ ca // PNc_5.48 //
GK19padnscpu:891: sanaye nṛpatāv akhaṇḍitājñe tvayi śāsaty avanīṃ dilīpakalpe /
GK19padnscpu:892: vidadhīta padaṃ sudurnaye kas tam ṛte hāramalimlucaṃ vihaṅgam // PNc_5.49 //
GK19padnscpu:893: asatām asuhṛn na lajjate 'yaṃ kim iti jyākiṇalāñchito bhujas te /
GK19padnscpu:894: avanau yad anena rakṣitāyāṃ vayam asyāṃ mūṣitāḥ patatriṇāpi // PNc_5.50 //
GK19padnscpu:895: apayātu khagaḥ sas tena kṛtyaṃ na hi me hāram iha tvam eva yācyaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:896: na diśanti kim atra coraluptaṃ bata ṣaṣṭāṃśabhujo vasundharāyāḥ // PNc_5.51 //
GK19padnscpu:897: pathi ced avatiṣṭhase praṇīte manunā nātha tad arpyatāṃ sa hāraḥ /
GK19padnscpu:898: na narendra bhavādṛśāḥ kadācit padavīṃ nyāyavidāṃ vilaṅghayanti // PNc_5.52 //
GK19padnscpu:899: nijam arthayase śilīmukhaṃ ced bhavatā yatnavatāpi kiṃ na labhyaḥ? /
GK19padnscpu:900: tvam anāgasi yac chaśiprabhāyāḥ praharan kelimṛge kṛtavyālīkaḥ // PNc_5.53 //
GK19padnscpu:901: atha vā mṛgayiṣyate na hāraṃ viśikhaṃ dāsyati coragendrakanyā /
GK19padnscpu:902: tvayi netrapathātithitvam āpte sulabho 'syā hi mahājanoparodhaḥ // PNc_5.54 //
GK19padnscpu:904: vahati praṇayoparuddhakūlā kalahaṃsair amum antareṇa revā // PNc_5.55 //
GK19padnscpu:907: tad itaḥ svayam eva deva gatvā pulinaṃ somabhuvas taraṅgavatyāḥ /
GK19padnscpu:908: khagaluptavibhūṣaṇaṃ kṣitau te phaṇirājendrasutāṃ vibodhayehi // PNc_5.57 //
GK19padnscpu:911: so nṛpaḥ kam api pramodam āpat ghanarājidhvanineva nīlakaṇṭhaḥ // PNc_5.58 //
GK19padnscpu:912: avadac ca vihasya pārthivendraḥ phaṇirājendrasutāvilāsinīṃ tām /
GK19padnscpu:914: api nāma mṛdūni vetsi vaktuṃ nipunaṃ nyāyam anujjhatī vacāṃsi /
